entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Kamouraska
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:38 PM EST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Partly cloudy. Temperature rising to minus 14 by morning.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness near midnight. Local blowing snow. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature rising to minus 14 by morning. Wind chill minus 33 this evening and minus 24 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of snow. High minus 7.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of light snow beginning in the morning. Amount 2 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 24 in the morning and minus 12 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 8.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 8. Wind chill near minus 12. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Saturday 04 February 2023
